attributes.action: Propose conditions which would allow the UK to stay in the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Juncker sacked
Stop European Political Superstate
New Treaties by Referendum 
Countries wishing to join debated by Nation Parliaments 80/20 rule
European Immigration policy like Australian model 
Commissions to be replaced
Power to nation states to expel/deport criminals.
EU stop funding companies moving from nation to nation
6 Months to find work if not, return to host country.
No right to settle
attributes.background:
We believe in a EUIS (EU of Independent States) and the following draft proposals would encourage UK Leave voters to rejoin the EU and, would also make the EU more secure and more successful.
Our view is that the development of a EU superstate is not what we want or most EU Citizens
